biotools.summary:
An R package for assessing consensus of multiple RNA-seq algorithms with RUV correction.

RNA-seq analysis using multiple algorithms.

This package allows users to perform DE analysis using multiple algorithms. It seeks consensus from multiple methods. Currently it supports "Voom", "EdgeR" and "DESeq". It uses RUV-seq (optional) to remove unwanted sources of variation.

publication_ruv - RUV integration with edgeR, voom/limma and DESeq2.

For more details, contact Ashley Waardenberg: a.waardenberg@gmail.com.

Clustering, MultipleComparison, Sequencing, Software, Transcriptomics
